name: ActivateAwsScanOptions
description: Activate Agentless scan options for an AWS account.

parameters.name: aws_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the AWS account for which to activate scan options.

value_schema.description: The ID of the AWS account.

parameters.name: resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the resource type to activate. Must be 'aws_scan_options'.

value_schema.description: The type of the resource. The value should always be `aws_scan_options`.

parameters.name: enable_lambda_function_scanning
parameters.description: Enable scanning of Lambda functions. Set to true to enable, false to disable.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning of Lambda functions is enabled.

parameters.name: enable_sensitive_data_scanning
parameters.description: Indicates if scanning for sensitive data is enabled for the AWS account.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for sensitive data is enabled.

parameters.name: enable_container_vulnerability_scanning
parameters.description: Enable scanning for vulnerabilities in containers when set to true.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in containers is enabled.

parameters.name: enable_vulnerability_scan_host_os
parameters.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in host operating systems is enabled.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in hosts is enabled.
